Description: 1987 Peavey Patriot DarkNatural Wood - MADE IN THE USA The guitar is overall in great condition. It has some scratches and buckle rash, but they are not very noticeable with the dark wood finish. The guitar still looks, sounds, and plays great with has lot of life left – including fret wear. Here are the features from the Peavey Patriot Operating Guide: The select maple neck is of a unique bi-laminate construction to provide unmatched rigidity and freedom from warpage. The instrument features a “full” scale lengthwith is 23 3/4” with 23 frets. The archof the fingerboard is on a 12” radius to allow excellent string bending characteristics without the buzzing and fretting-out problems. The body is made from the finest hand selected hardwood which is finished in a dark natural wood. Two single-coil high performance pickups provide both high power and full-range operations. One Master Volume Control,and one master Tone Control The fully articulated 13 gauge steel bridge istriple chrome plated and utilizes 3/8” solid steel saddlesThe Three-positionselector switch determines which pickup is operational (neck, both, bridge). Thisallows for a rhythm, lead, or humbucking configuration. Hardware includes: Heavy-duty tuning machines with chrome buttons, Graphlon top nut, Military Grade pickup selector switch,and Black-White-Black three layer laminated pickguard.
Title: 1987 Peavey Patriot - Dark Natural Wood - MADE IN THE USA
